vote.title: Authorize payment to the Texas Department of Transportation for cost overruns related to the intersection and traffic signal improvements at six off-system locations: Illinois Avenue and Kiest Boulevard, Mockingbird Lane and Williamson Road, Elam Road and Prairie Creek Road, Corinth Street and Illinois Avenue, Jefferson Boulevard and Westmoreland Road, and Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard and Holmes Street; in the amount of $206,967.09 - Financing: General Fund
vote.description: Authorize payment to the Texas Department of Transportation for cost overruns related to the intersection and traffic signal improvements at six off-system locations: Illinois Avenue and Kiest Boulevard, Mockingbird Lane and Williamson Road, Elam Road and Prairie Creek Road, Corinth Street and Illinois Avenue, Jefferson Boulevard and Westmoreland Road, and Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard and Holmes Street; in the amount of $206,967.09 - Financing: General Fund
